mapper.select: SELECT lms_notice_no lmsNoticeNo, lms_notice_title lmsNoticeTitle, lms_notice_writer lmsNoticeWriter, lms_notice_updatedate lmsNoticeUpdateDate FROM lms_notice LIMIT #{beginRow}, #{rowPerPage}

SELECT lms_notice_no lmsNoticeNo, lms_notice_title lmsNoticeTitle, lms_notice_content lmsNoticeContent, lms_notice_writer lmsNoticeWriter, lms_notice_updatedate lmsNoticeUpdateDate, lms_notice_count lmsNoticeCount FROM lms_notice WHERE lms_notice_no = #{lmsNoticeNo}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO lms_notice( account_id, lms_notice_writer, lms_notice_title, lms_notice_content, lms_notice_createdate, lms_notice_updatedate ) VALUES ( #{accountId}, #{lmsNoticeWriter}, #{lmsNoticeTitle}, #{lmsNoticeContent}, NOW(), NOW() )
mapper.update: UPDATE lms_notice SET lms_notice_title = #{lmsNoticeTitle}, lms_notice_content = #{lmsNoticeContent}, lms_notice_updatedate = NOW() WHERE lms_notice_no = #{lmsNoticeNo}
